title: Microsoft 365 Administrator
subtitle: Enterprise Microsoft 365 Administration Expert
description: Deploy, manage, and secure Microsoft 365 tenants including identity, security, compliance, and threat management
overview: This intensive 4-day course prepares you for the MS-102 certification by covering all four exam domains: tenant deployment and management, Microsoft Entra identity and access, security and threat management with Microsoft Defender XDR, and compliance management with Microsoft Purview. You will gain hands-on experience managing enterprise Microsoft 365 environments end to end.

learningObjectives.title: Deploy & Manage Microsoft 365 Tenants
learningObjectives.description: Create and configure tenants, manage domains, users, groups, roles, licensing, and monitor service health

learningObjectives.title: Microsoft Entra Identity & Access
learningObjectives.description: Implement directory synchronization, authentication methods, conditional access, MFA, and identity protection

learningObjectives.title: Security & Threat Management
learningObjectives.description: Manage security with Microsoft Defender XDR including Defender for Office 365, Endpoint, and Cloud Apps

learningObjectives.title: Compliance with Microsoft Purview
learningObjectives.description: Implement information protection, data lifecycle management, sensitivity labels, and data loss prevention

modules.title: Deploy and Manage a Microsoft 365 Tenant
modules.description: Implement and manage tenants, users, groups, roles, and licensing
topics: Creating and configuring a Microsoft 365 tenant
Implementing and managing domains
Configuring org settings: security, privacy, and organizational profile
Monitoring service health and configuring notifications
Network connectivity insights
Managing software updates via the admin center
Creating and managing users, contacts, and groups
Managing Microsoft 365 licenses and group-based licensing
Bulk user management with PowerShell
Implementing roles in Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra
Managing role groups across Defender XDR, Purview, and workloads
Delegation with administrative units and PIM

modules.title: Implement and Manage Microsoft Entra Identity and Access
modules.description: Configure identity synchronization, authentication, and secure access
topics: Preparing for identity synchronization with IdFix
Implementing Microsoft Entra Connect Sync and Cloud Sync
Monitoring synchronization with Microsoft Entra Connect Health
Troubleshooting synchronization issues
Implementing authentication methods and SSPR
Microsoft Entra Password Protection
Planning and implementing identity protection
Microsoft Entra ID Protection
Conditional Access policies and MFA
Investigating and resolving authentication issues

modules.title: Manage Security and Threats with Microsoft Defender XDR
modules.description: Implement threat protection across email, endpoints, and cloud apps
topics: Exposure Management and Microsoft Secure Score
Reviewing and responding to incidents, alerts, and guided hunting
Microsoft Defender XDR reports and Threat Intelligence
Implementing threat policies in Defender for Office 365
Configuring alert policies and investigating email threats
Managing attack simulations and training campaigns
Onboarding devices to Defender for Endpoint
Configuring endpoint settings and vulnerability management
Configuring Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps
Cloud App Discovery and app connector configuration
Managing restricted entities and blocked users

modules.title: Manage Compliance with Microsoft Purview
modules.description: Implement information protection, data lifecycle management, and DLP
topics: Implementing sensitive information types with keywords and regex
Configuring retention labels, policies, and retention policies
Implementing sensitivity labels and label policies
Monitoring label usage with Content Explorer and Activity Explorer
Configuring DLP policies for Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams
Configuring Endpoint DLP
Reviewing and responding to DLP alerts, events, and reports

handsOnLabs.title: Tenant Configuration & User Management
handsOnLabs.description: Configure a Microsoft 365 tenant, manage domains, users, groups, roles, and licensing with PowerShell

handsOnLabs.title: Identity Synchronization & Conditional Access
handsOnLabs.description: Set up Microsoft Entra Connect, configure conditional access policies, and implement MFA

handsOnLabs.title: Microsoft Defender XDR Configuration
handsOnLabs.description: Configure Defender for Office 365 threat policies, onboard endpoints, and set up Cloud Apps

handsOnLabs.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance
handsOnLabs.description: Configure sensitivity labels, retention policies, and DLP policies across Microsoft 365 workloads

prerequisites: Functional experience with all Microsoft 365 workloads
Experience with Microsoft Entra ID administration
Working knowledge of networking and Active Directory
targetAudience: IT administrators managing enterprise M365 environments
System administrators transitioning to cloud administration

instructor.title: Principal Cloud Architect & Engineer
instructor.bio: Microsoft Certified Trainer with extensive experience in Microsoft 365 enterprise deployments and administration. Has managed Microsoft 365 environments for organizations with thousands of users across hybrid and cloud-only scenarios.
certifications: Microsoft Certified: Identity and Access Administrator Associate

personalStory.story: Managing Microsoft 365 at enterprise scale is where strategy meets execution. I've helped organizations of all sizes deploy, secure, and optimize their M365 environments, from initial tenant setup through advanced Defender configurations. This course distills that hands-on experience into the practical skills every M365 administrator needs.
